mapper.select: SELECT product_name, product_category, product_size, product_color, product_price FROM product ORDER BY product_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(product_category, product_name, product_price, product_color product_size, product_desc, product_quantity) VALUES (#{product_category}, #{product_name}, #{product_price}, #{product_color}, #{product_size}, #{product_desc}, #{product_quantity})
